name: wallet_guardian_scan
description: AI-powered wallet security scan. Analyzes token approvals, transaction patterns, fund flows, and known threat databases. Returns risk score (0-10), severity rating, detailed findings, and recommended actions. Covers unlimited approval detection, drainer pattern matching, behavioral anomaly analysis, and governance chain tracing. Results delivered as structured JSON.

requirement.tier: Scan tier: quick | standard | deep (optional, defaults to standard)
